title: Help pleaseeeee !
content:
Please help me to identify this font ! Appreciate your help a lot

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823093453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hotel_intercontinental_4000.gif)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hotel\_intercontinental.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823093453/http:/typophile.com/files/hotel_intercontinental.gif) | 2.91 KB |
author: cherryjieer

comments.content: Hard to say with such a bad quality sample... What's the origin? The website address, for instance, could help to identify it.

[http://www.intercontinental.com/hotels/gb/en/kuala-lumpur/kulha/hoteldet...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823093453/http:/www.intercontinental.com/hotels/gb/en/kuala-lumpur/kulha/hoteldetail?fhqs=view/photosView "http://www.intercontinental.com/hotels/gb/en/kuala-lumpur/kulha/hoteldetail?fhqs=view/photosView")  
and  
 [http://www.intercontinental.com/hotels/gb/en/kuala-lumpur/kulha/hoteldet...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823093453/http:/www.intercontinental.com/hotels/gb/en/kuala-lumpur/kulha/hoteldetail/about-the-hotel/feature/spa "http://www.intercontinental.com/hotels/gb/en/kuala-lumpur/kulha/hoteldetail/about-the-hotel/feature/spa")  
are the relevant websites.  
Rather expensive place to stay.  
Don
Thanks Don. I'd already visited these addresses without finding it. That's why I've asked for more.

Ryuk, They don't have much in the way of pdfs. What I found used Calibri.  
At this scale it's hard to make out anything other than gross mismatches.  
Here's an experiment with Phoenica Med and Phoenica Med Cond:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823093453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PhoenicaMed_5413.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823093453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PhoeniciaCondMed_4521.jpg)
  
Don
